page.title: 07Farming in Cheshire 4
page.content: in. This holds 90 tons and we have the main slurry store of all 21 farms which my dad manages. Our farm is an arable farm. The field behind our house is 195 acres in area. We altenate the crop from wheat to oil seed rape. This and the other farms are owned by the Wholesale Co-operative Society. Potato Growing __________________ In March we start to cultevate the ground. The ground is then harrowed and artificial fertilizer and pesticide is spread before the potatos are planted using a potato setting machine.
